Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Establishes an alternatively assessed student program
Summary: Establishes an alternatively assessed student program in the New York City school district which allows one student, per school, per year, to be hired as a school aid in any public school within such district.
LawCode: Add Title 21-A Chap 12-A ยง21-974.5, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing an alternatively assessed student program
